src_original: asaṃstutasyāpi janasya loke  so 'bhūt priyas tasya yathaiva loke 247
sa devatānām api mānasāni  prasādabhaktipravaṇāni cakre 248
dṛptasvabhāvāḥ sacivā nṛpāś ca  puṇyaprabhāvāt pṛthivīśvarāṇāṃ
puṇyair vihīnān anuyāty alakṣmīr  vispandamānān api nītimārge
paryety amarṣād iva tadvipakṣān 256  duḥkhapratiṣṭhād ayaśo'nubaddhād  apuṇyamārgād uparamya tasmāt
nivāse rākṣasādīnāṃ kathaṃ saṃsthātum icchasi 225  anapekṣya svajīve 'pi kaumārye yat pravrajatā  śrīmanti hitvā bhavanāny api tvaṃ  kasmād araṇye 'tra matiṃ karoṣi 227
kathaṃ nu śokasya vaśaṃ prayāsi  imām avasthāṃ hi tavekṣamāṇā  dviṣo 'pi bāṣpāpihitekṣaṇāḥ syuḥ 229
saṃpādayethā nivasan svagehe  dharmañ ca sallokamanorathaṃ ca 230
viṣayopaniveśane 'pi mohād  vraṇakaṇḍūyanavat sukhābhimānaḥ 237  prāyaḥ samṛddhyā madam eti gehe  mānaṃ kulenāpi madena darpaṃ
ka ivāśrayed ahimukhaṃ vilayaṃ  bahutīvraduḥkhanilayaṃ nilayaṃ 239
prasīdati yathā cetas tridive 'pi tathā kutaḥ 240  paraprasādārjitavṛttir apy ato
